title: Bachelor of Business Administration in Finance
description: Earning your Bachelor's in Finance at Kennesaw State University provides you with market-driven skills for an in-demand field.  When you graduate from Kennesaw State with your Finance degree, you’ll have the opportunity to be a part of a fast-growing industry where the median salary for a financial manager is $129,890 nationally.
school: Department of Economics, Finance & Quantitative Analysis
